body.head: TEI Corpus
body.p: This TEI customization file includes the minimum TEI modules likely to be needed in the creation of linguistic corpora. It is modified to fit the annotation schema created in the Project Redewiedergabe (www.redewiedergabe.de).

attDef.desc: indicates the type of the speech, thought or writing representation.
provides a unique identifier for the annotation bearing the attribute.
indicates the medium of a representation.
indicates whether a representation is nonfactual or not.
indicates that the said-annotation contains or is introduced by an act, which refers to a speech, thought or writing representation.
indicates whether the said-annotation is a metaphor.
indicates that the said-Annotation follows the form of a speech, thought or writing representation but its pragmatical purpose is another.
indicates the level of embedding of a said-annotation.
indicates whether a representation is nonfactual or not.
indicates the position of a frame with regard to its linked said-annotation.
provides a unique identifier for the element bearing the attribute.
